channel.title: I need this to repeat

item.title: I need this to repeat
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

try using the Delete procedure

procedure Delete(var s:String;ifrom:integer;icount:integer);

how about this
[scar]
repeat
generator;
delete(therandomstuff,1,20+random(5));
wait(500);
until(isfkeydown(2));
[/scar]

item.title: I need this to repeat
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

i need this script to repeat but i dont want it to write the first thing it wrote then add a new thing then add a new thing to that…can someone make it repeat and make a new line for ea one?

[scar]program New;

var i: Integer;
theRandomStuff: string;

const
theString= ‘abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz’;
message1=‘SCAR’;

function randomNumber: integer;
begin
result:= random(10);
end;

function randomLetter: string;
begin
result:= copy(theString, random(25), 1);
end;

procedure generator;
begin
for i:= 1 to random(20) + 5 do
case random(2) of
0: theRandomStuff:= theRandomStuff + inttostr(randomNumber);
1: theRandomStuff:= theRandomStuff + randomLetter;
end;
writeln(theRandomStuff);
if theRandomStuff
end;

begin
generator;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
